title: Administrative Assistant, Safety and Security
overview: The Administrative Assistant, Safety and Security position at Netflix is responsible for providing support to the Directors of Physical Security and Environmental, Health and Safety (EHS) and their team projects, including managing calendars, coordinating travel arrangements, and handling administrative tasks.
description:
We are seeking an experienced Administrative Assistant to join our growing team. This position will be responsible for providing support to the Directors of Physical Security and Environmental, Health and Safety (EHS) and their team projects. This role will be based in Los Angeles on a hybrid schedule (Three days in office per week).


The Opportunity:
Netflix is the world's leading streaming entertainment service with 204 million paid memberships in over 190 countries enjoying TV series, documentaries, and feature films across a wide variety of genres and languages. Members can watch as much as they want, anytime, anywhere, on any internet-connected screen. Members can play, pause and resume watching, all without commercials or commitments.


The Role:
A successful candidate will be passionate, self-motivated, proactive, quick-thinking, flexible, able to pivot when necessary, thorough and able to juggle multiple and diverse responsibilities with a strong emphasis on organization and unwavering attention to detail at all times. This is a demanding and fast-moving position that requires someone who is a proactive and positive thinker, and able to exercise good judgment and communication.Â

extras.title: Responsibilities
content: Provide administrative support to Security & EHS Directors
Provide support to the overall Security & EHS Teams in Los Angeles and international offices
Manage complex calendars for a growing team, including scheduling internal and external meetings with multiple parties across multiple time zones
Manage general administrative duties, including processing and tracking invoices, facilitating team and visitor requests, and ordering supplies
Coordinate travel arrangements, both domestically and internationally
Assist with onboarding of new hires
Collaborate with executive assistants and admins across teams on various aspects, including conferences and off-site meetings
Manage a heavy volume of communication and administrative paperwork internally and externally
Organize, attend, and participate in stakeholder meetings
Coordinate vendor meetings
Create a positive atmosphere of professionalism and support
Build and maintain strong working relationships with executives, department leads and staff, and outside vendors to deliver results based on their needs
Support team leaders & coordinators with ad hoc projects

extras.title: Qualifications:
content: 4+ years experience as an Administrative or Executive Assistant, providing support to multiple executives at a fast-paced company (experience in an entertainment/tech setting a plus)
Team player who operates in a team-oriented setting
Ability to be discrete and maintain confidential information
Proficiency in Google Suites (Gmail, Drive, Calendar, Docs, Sheets, Slides)
Self-starter with the ability to multi-task, prioritize and respond accordingly in a fast-paced environment
Great communicator who can build strong working relationships with vendors, and internal and external partners
Willingness to continue learning to ensure understanding of current production process and needs
Strong written and verbal communication skills
Willingness to take educated risks and think out of the box
